name: Archi Token
description: Archi token is a token used to measure or count the number of shares of Archi finance. Just like a company in real world, holding Archi token becomes a share holder of Archi finance. The total amount of Archi token is fixed and it cannot be minted anywhere within the platform. Use case of $archi token -By locking $archi into $vlarchi tokens, users receive: 1. Share of protocol fees 2. Governance rights on Archi DAO -By providing archi-eth liquidity pair,users receive 1. share fees from Liquidity provider incentive pool 2. share trading fees in uni-v3
